title.narrative: Support to the regeneration of the tourism portside and seafront precincts in Port Vila - Vanuatu Tourism Infrastructure Project (VTIP)

description.narrative: Result 1 - a functional, safe, and attractive seafront precinct and portside precinct in Port Vila facilitates increased tourism arrivals by sea and by air, increased per-capita tourism expenditure from visitors by sea and by air, decrease in urban poverty, job creation for Ni-Vanuatu, and increased resilience to natural disasters and climate change

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Tourism, Trade, Commerce, and Ni-Vanuatu Business, Government of Vanuatu

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
